replies.body:
Woah the last picture of Graves looks pretty cool

edit: agreed, would've been even more awesome with a cigar
he needs a cigar though
like this?
Yes, but less monochromatic
At least he has a cigar in the mold. Very important detail.
that statue isn't allowed at riot, it has a cigar
Ladies will now continue with their Graves fantacies

> [{quoted}](name=Raith alghul,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=08IA30vd,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-08-13T19:14:09.790+0000)
>
> he needs a cigar though

Ya your right
How can Graves smoke his cigars without a cigar. Probably why he was so mad at TF. Got stuck in jail, no cigar. I'd be mad.
Edit: Graves 2.0
edit - sexy af
Cheers for throwing this together Jynx, always nice to see artists get the recognition they deserve.
NP! =) The community creates such amazing content, so I love making these type of posts!

I actually have a rather neat suggestion for a showcase- lazy cosplays. Cosplays that can be thrown together in a matter of minutes with random household objects and such, like this Jax one I made where I stuffed a whole bunch of paper cups into a hood: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/zm6jsOwA-so-i-made-a-jax-cosplay-yesterday
My cute Tahm Kench came with Bilgewater too :3 Here my gallery --> https://www.artstation.com/artwork/cute-tahm-kench

So cute! O_O Haha

Thank you for sharing!
That is both adorable and impressive that you can make a demon like Tahm look that cute :D
Aww thank u so much!
You are very welcome{{item:2009}}

AND ONLY ONE PICTURE FOR THE GLORY OF NAUTILUS? WHERE IS THE LOVE FOR THE BIG METAL MAN?
 {{item:3070}} {{champion:111}} {{item:3070}}
Logged in just to upvote this.
TF looks understandably concerned about what's possibly about to happen in that third picture
I would be too knowing that he can eat enimes AND alies 0_0
Gotta eat the booty like groceries

Wait, that's Twisted Fate? I thought it was Jack Sparrow or something.
Nah, Cutpurse Twisted Fate probaly isn't as drunk as Jack, though he's as lucky as him :)

Open post about Bilgewater.

First image has nothing to do with Bilgewater.
It's supposed to be a custom Bilgewater Ekko.
and it looks pretty boss if you ask me

it should be a skin. I mean, a time-bending pirate would be cool. And maybe a special taunt to a enemy gangplank saying something similar to what he says to urgot except for more like a taunt than sympathy

That Corsair Quinn by XephrosART looks sick

im happy that dicoi made his graves sculpture with the cigar RIP-graves cigar  RIP- dfg{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

I feel like some version of Pirate Tahm Kench would be cool eventually. His Q could be a grappling hook or something like that and his R could be a sailing ship.
He might eat GP's oranges tho...
His own damn event and the Saltwater Scourge doesn't get any fan art, sons of bitchhes...
WE CAN HAVE AN AWESOME BUST OF {{champion:104}} BUT {{champion:104}} CAN'T HAVE HIS CIGA-oh...oh, nevermind.  There it is...uh...carry on, I guess.  Sorry.

Cigar or Bust!


(why not both?)
#ShipWrecked
{{champion:4}}  and {{champion:104}}  Siting on a raft looking all mighty ready for something more to happen.  Romance time I think.
Bilgewater Ekko? so much yes!
dang that rap battle. {{champion:41}}  has bars "Potassium dinner now lets just say I'm K"
